Sections.Text: The Bosch Estate, 1909. Trapped in the halls beneath the manse, Cornelius Bosch's final experiment lies in wait, locked behind mystic wards.
Bosch's killer, Elias Tyree, has come in search of the dead occultist's last secret: The Golem.
Left unfinished by its creator, the Golem, needs otherworldly energy to unlock its true power. Until now, it has had no source for such energy.
By breaking the wards Bosch left to hold the Golem in place, Tyree has created an arcane rift.
The Golem must make its way to the rift youself and absorb its energy while preventing Tyree and his intruders from getting there first.
The Angry Shades of Bosch's victims now serve the golem, they need to get close to use their chill touch on enemies.
Lost Soul Orbs are singularities of psychic agony, capable of deadly ranged attacks but very unstable, dissipating with a single enemy attack.
Vengeful Wraiths are the most powerful and hard to destroy spirits, with attacks that frighten and disable intruders but do little direct damage.
